Class Synth

java.lang.Object
Synth
public class Synth extends Object
Synth class for managing the synthesizer and its components

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableVoice

      public int getAvailableVoice()
      Find an available (inactive) voice using Java Streams
      Returns:
      index of available voice, or -1 if all voices are active

    • noteOn

      public void noteOn(int voiceIndex, int note, double velocity)
      Trigger a note on the specified voice
      Parameters:
      voiceIndex - the index of the voice to use
      note - the MIDI note number
      velocity - the velocity (0.0 to 1.0)

    • noteOff

      public void noteOff(int voiceIndex)
      Release a note on the specified voice
      Parameters:
      voiceIndex - the index of the voice to release

    • getVoices

      public SynthVoice[] getVoices()
      Get the array of voices
      Returns:
      the array of SynthVoice instances

    • getKeyboardController

      public KeyboardController getKeyboardController()
      Gets keyboard controller instance
      Returns:
      the keyboard controller instance

    • start

      public void start()
      Start the synthesizer and show the keyboard window

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stop the synthesizer

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run the synthesizer
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
